verification.subject: Account verification
verification.title: Account verification
verification.thanksForSigningUp: Hi there! Thanks for signing up. To complete your registration and secure your account, please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verification.buttonDoesntWork: If the button doesn't work, you can copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.urlWillExpire: This verification link will expire in 24 hours for security reasons.
verification.ignoreEmail: If you didn't create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
Are you sure you want to delete this plan item?

event.planItemsDescription: In this section, you can add individual elements of the event schedule, such as the wedding ceremony or the reception. Provide details about the date, time, and location of each part of the celebration to have a complete timetable. This information will later be visible to guests confirming their attendance, helping them navigate the overall event plan.
event.contactsDescription: In this section, add the contacts of key people related to the event. This information will be visible to guests when confirming their attendance, so make sure the details are up-to-date and complete. You can easily view, edit, or add new contacts to ensure smooth event organization.

guests.noGuestsFound: No guests found. Start by adding a new invitation.
